I apologize for the confusion! Unfortunately, I don't have access to real-time information or your device's clock. Since I can't determine the current time, I won't be able to accurately find reminders scheduled for "later" (which depends on knowing what time it is now).

Once you provide some time context, I'll be able to search your reminders for that period!

I completely understand the frustration! Unfortunately, I don't have access to real-time information like your device's clock or calendar. I'm an AI assistant without direct access to your phone or current time data.

To help you with your reminders for "later," here are some options:
1. You could tell me approximately what time it is (e.g., "it's morning" or "around 2 PM")
2. Or give me a specific time frame (e.g., "reminders after 4 PM" or "things scheduled for this evening")
3. Or I can show you all your upcoming reminders regardless of time

Which approach would work best for you? I want to make sure I can help you effectively!
